metadata.title: CVE-2021-23520 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The package juce-framework/juce before 6.1.5 are vulnerable to Arbitrary File Write via Archive Extraction (Zip Slip) via the ZipFile::uncompressEntry function in juce_ZipFile.cpp. This vulnerability is triggered when the archive is extracted upon calling uncompressTo() on a ZipFile object.

criterions.comment: juce package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
